attributes.title: Peter Dinklage
attributes.imdb: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0227759/'''Peter Dinklage''' (born 11 June 1969) is an American actor who has worked in television, film and on stage. He is arguably best known for his roles in ''wikipedia:The Station Agent
